title: 189 46 "Eternal Friends! The Vowed Bell Echoes Across the Mighty Seas!"Transliteration: "Eien no shinyū! Daikaigen ni hibiku chikai no kane" (Japanese:永遠の親友!大海原に響く誓いの鐘) Katsumi Tokoro Hirohiko Kamisaka April 4, 2004(2004-04-04) December 31, 2008
